mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lincoln, Abraham to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lincoln, Abraham
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Wheeling, Oct. 23rd, 1862. Hon. F.H. Peirpoint ('By telegraph from') Washington 23, 1862. Your Letter of the seventeenth just recd. When you come to Washington I shall be pleased to show you the record upon which we acted. Nevertheless answer this distinctly saying you wish Ross & Richie or any other two you really want & they shall be appointed. A. Lincoln. 48 G 111 pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lincoln, Abraham
Washington, DC
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
